text: "Shake Your Love" is a 1987 song by Debbie Gibson and is the leading single from her debut studio album Out of the Blue. It went to number 4 in the United States, number 7 in the United Kingdom, number 36 in New Zealand, number 27 in Australia and number 3 in Ireland. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1987 songs Category:Dance-pop songs Category:Debbie Gibson songs
title: Shake Your Love
